topic.title: Metamorphosis
topic.body: I want to share my condolences to all who have read Franz Kafka's The Metamorphosis thinking it would be worthy. Well, I saw everyone saying how Kafka's work is strange and awesome and I thought it would have a nice story and a memorable end but it was just a time wasting stuff who made me want to jump out of the first floor window yelling at Jesus to give my time back. I think Franz Kafka did an oopsie. Don't you agree??????

topic.title: How to block someone?
topic.body: "Manage blocked users and sites" href is "#[object Object],Manage blocked users and sites" aand when I click it shows "Your mute list is empty" but no input to type a username to block. What am I doing wrong?

1566400778_1LhSwRbe5DT25JGcce1HFRWq75qQD.body: did your wife dumped your for a brazilian guy?
